summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5812 for the improvement of West Myrtle Street, from 30th Avenue Southwest to 35th Avenue Southwest; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 76630 as amended by Ordinance No. 76846, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
